title: Pulse Oximeter
description:
This App displays blood oxygenation (SpO2), photoplethysmography (PPG) waveform, and heart rate data as a function of time. This app works in conjunction with a bluetooth wireless pulse oximeter (Nonin Onyx II 9560). Supports phone and tablets.

This App is completely free, does not track any data, and does not contain any in-app products or contain ads.

Make sure Bluetooth is switched "on" on the phone/tablet. Go to Settings->Bluetooth and pair the phone with sensor. Access code is provided on sensor housing.

For more information: www.MedicalAvatars.com.

title: Pulse for Booking.com Partners
description:
Introducing Pulse, the free app for Booking.com partners

Whether you run a resort or want to list your apartment, Pulse helps you manage your business on the go. Available in 43 languages, our partner app offers a quick and easy way to communicate with guests, manage reservations, and grow your business from the palm of your hand.

Stay in touch with guests

In just 2 taps, you can reply to guest requests or send a welcome message. We made it even easier by letting you create and manage templates. After guests check out, you can read and respond to their reviews directly in the app, plus analyze all feedback to better understand guest experience.

Manage your property on the go

Quickly find, update, and share reservation details with your team, so everyone is up to date. Availability and rates can be adjusted easily to react to guest demand and secure last-minute bookings. Also, uploading new photos directly from your phone can help attract more potential guests.

Get the updates you need, when you need them

Get real-time notifications about every aspect of your business. Select what updates you want to receive, from new bookings, cancellations, and modifications, to invoices, new promotions, and when you’re almost sold out. Your success is important to us, and we have the tools to help you succeed.

title: Heart Rate Monitor
description:
Heart Rate Monitor uses camera on your mobile device to measure heart rate.

How it works:
Install this application and put your finger tip on the lens of the back camera of your mobile phone or tablet device to start measurement. Application registers micro-changes of blood pressure in your finger with help of camera and uses it to calculate heart rate.

Features:
- Smart measurement process reduces noise level and prevents you from getting incorrect results.
- Your camera flash will be used as main lighting source for best calculation accuracy if your device has it. In case your camera detects too much noise, you will be informed about that instead of getting incorrect results.
- It takes just 15 seconds to calculate heart rate with 90% accuracy.
- Use endless mode to understand how your heart rate is changed in time. Use it during sport training to understand how fast your heart rate is normalized after each exercise.
- Use history to save your results and review it any time you want.
- Use widget to measure heart rate directly from your phone home screen.

title: Baby Heartbeat Monitor, Fetal Doppler, Face Yoga
description:
Baby Heartbeat Monitor, Fetal Doppler, Heart Rate, Face Yoga app is the most accurate heart rate monitor.  Heart Rate & Baby Monitor helps you measure your pulse (heart rate) using your phone camera, learn how the numbers relate to your general wellness, do facial exercises to get rid of wrinkles, perform effective workouts to get in shape and track your progress.

Measure accurately your pulse and heartbeat zone with your heart rate & health monitor after sleeping or during workouts & training. 


Baby Heartbeat Monitor, Fetal Doppler, Heart Rate app provides : 

* fetal doppler  
* baby doppler
* baby heartbeat monitor
* pulse rate
* unborn heart
* fetal heartbeat listener
* instant hearth rate
* pregnancy tracker
* measure heart rate
* face yoga
* face fitness for youthful skin 
* facial exercises for face health 
* getting rid of wrinkles
* handcrafted daily face yoga workouts
* daily tips that that help you see results faster

A fresh look, fightingage, a chiseled chin, Hollywood cheekbones, smooth skin tone, smooth, wrinkle-free and free of sagging skin, radiant with youth and health - absolutely natural by Face Yoga.

• Just hold your phone or tablet and simply cover the back camera with your finger to read your pulse. It's never been easier to know what your heart rate is! Without any external hardware, just using the built-in camera/sensor of your smartphone or tablet, you can get accurate readings almost instantly.

Your Improvements  in fitness: 
• Built-in high-intensity circuit training exercises that only take a couple of minutes to complete. It can be very useful while exercising, if you're under stress, if you have a heart-related medical condition, or even just out of curiosity. See how your heart rate relates to your fitness and endurance.  Identifies heart rate training zones (Rest, Fat burn, Cardio, and Peak)

According to Mayo Clinic, a normal resting heartbeat rate for adults ranges from 60 to 100 beats per minute (BPM). Heart rate can be affected by stress, anxiety, depression, emotions, activity level, fitness level, body composition, and medication use.  Generally, a lower heartbeat at rest implies more efficient heart function and better cardiovascular fitness.
 
When will you use Heart Rate & Baby Monitor?
For accurate measurement, Heart Rate & Baby Monitor should be used daily to measure heartbeat or pulse. Recommended tagging your heart rate after sleeping or during workouts to separate resting heart rate from workout heart rate.
 
Another feature of this app is the Baby monitor app.
Baby Heartbeat Monitor, Fetal Doppler, Heart Rate app is a universal video and audio nanny and babysitter for your phone, tablet, or computer. Hear every noise, stream live video through a camera, watch and soothe your child remotely. 

Easy to Use: The app requires two devices. One stays in the child’s room while the other one stays with you. No registration or connection adjustments are required and the initial setup takes less than 30 seconds.

Every Noise/ Sound: Are you not sure what the little sound you barely hear is? Sensitize the sound for a moment so you can hear every tiny sound from your baby’s room.

Talk to your baby: Simply press a button and speak. Your child will be always one tap away from you.
 
DISCLAIMER
- Baby Heartbeat Monitor, Fetal Doppler, Heart Rate app should not be used as a medical device.
- In some devices, this app may make the LED flash very hot.

title: Blood Pressure Diary
description:
Note that this app DOES NOT measure the blood pressure. Please use FDA-approved blood pressure monitor (i.e., BP monitor) to measure BP reliably

 Control high blood pressure (i.e., Hypertension) with our app! 

 Simple and Easy to use blood pressure app
    1. You can easily log and track systolic, diastolic and pulse by just swiping your finger
    2. You can easily add your tags (e.g., irregular heartbeat, cuff location like left/right arms, seated/reclined)
    3. You can easily search your data (e.g., by date, tags, and bloodpressure zones)

Fully integrate with blood pressure zones 
    1. Automatically calculate bloodpressure zone
    2. Support all blood pressure zones (i.e., Stage 1 and 2 Hypertension, Prehypertension, Normal, Hypotension)
    3. Helpful to monitor and control your blood pressure and health
    4. Easy-to-use for BP monitoring and tracking app

 It’s ALL FREE
    1. No restrictive feature (e.g., unlimited csv export)

Beautiful material UIs
    1. Statistics with graphs and charts (e.g., average, minimum, maximum)
    2. Interactive UI for blood pressure zones
    3. Simple, but very effective UI

 Support auto backup (> Android 6.0) and free csv export 
    1. Send your bloodpressure data to your physician or doctor
    2. Also record heartrate and heartbeat

* Blood pressure (BP) monitoring/tracking and heart rate are very important for health. You can start managing your bloodpressure and heartrate now by using our blood pressure app, especially high bloodpressure or low blood pressure patients.
* According to American Heart Association (AHA), normal range of blood pressure are  Systolic 91 ~ 120 mmHg and Diastolic 61 ~ 80 mmHg. Please enjoy our blood pressure (BP) log and tracker app.
* We'd appreciate your valuable feedback. Please, report bugs or request features to bluefish12390@gmail.com.

Easy to understand and use. Also it's nice to be able to export the result. The graphics very clean and clear! The only thing missing is that I can't choose which account of Google I want the automatic backup goes.

Easy to use. I like that it shows the stages of hypertension. It would be nice though if you can write notes for each reading such as reading taken while sitting a few minutes or lying down, with what type of medicine, etc

I really like the application it's easy to read and the explanations are clear. Everything is clear and easy. It motivates me to take my pressure and have a comfortable idea of my health. Because of this application I am in control. Thanks

Great app. Great for privacy! No "cloud" (spying) required! Works reliably. Rotten controls for add: takes too long to spin those things back and forth. Also, no way to edit an entry, that I can see. Over all, very good. Recommend.

title: CareMeOximeter
description:
This application is only for use with the Finger Pulse Oximeter. The leader in fingertip pulse oximetry introduces a wireless Bluetooth 4.0 Smart pulse oximeter for use with both Android and IOS System. 

The Bluetooth Smart Pulse Oximeter combined with this application will allow you to noninvasively track and trend blood oxygen saturation (SpO2) , pulse rate (PR) and Perfusion Index (PI) for health, wellness, sports, and aviation use.

Saving the test results of every time, and the data can be showed in the form of curve.

Adding family members to the users independently.

The maximum and minimum value of PR, SpO2 and PI can be setted. This app features an audible alarm to let you know when values are too high or too low.

Measurements:
%SpO2- displays level of blood oxygenation. The value next to the heart symbol on the display indicates pulse rate.

Visit www.angelsounds.net for information about how to purchase a Bluetooth Smart Pulse Oximeter to work with this application.

NOTE: The Bluetooth Smart Pulse Oximeter is not a medical device and is not intended to diagnose or treat any medical conditions or diseases. Use only as directed to ensure accurate readings.

recentChanges: fix some bug
comments: They make you register and put in your age, weight, height and gender, before you can see if your device will connect to their app. In my case (and many others) it doesn't work, it scans for a device but won't find anything. I highly suggest you STAY AWAY!!!

Works fine for me. Whatever the problem was with all these commenters failing to register and login, I dunno. The cheap oximeter device works fine (Jumper model JPD-500F, for $24 on eBay). The app connects to it by Bluetooth, records the data, saves the data, graphs a summary, AND allows you to share the stats and graph by email/Facebook/text message just fine. The three things measured are the pulse rate, the SpO2, and the very handy Perfusion Index (showing how solid the readings really are). The settings screen even adjusts the min/max for these 3 data that will trigger a beeping alarm if the reading gets too high or too low. Nice! . . . . . These features work in BOTH of the Jumper-Medical apps currently in the Google app store: the "JUMPER Health" app for all their devices and also the "CareMeOximeter" app for only the oximeter device. . . . . . The only feature I still wish for is to export a .CSV file, so that a spreadsheet can analyze the raw measurement data. And maybe to zoom in on the pulse graph line, to see whatever detail might show up there. . . . . . Nice app, since the latest update.
I would like to use Sop2 sensor but first step in the app is to registering. You can't use app if you are not registered. What is it? Why do I need register to check sensor? USELESS APP! Removed.

I can get it to pair with my Samsung S9+, but you must pair it everytime you want to use it. Once the app is open and the Oximeter is turned on they should pair automatically. If you don't want to record your data go into your phone setting and turn it off. The only one that needs to be allowed is your location.
Haven't worked in my device. After being registered properly, can't make a connection to Bluetooth. So, It is big an issue and badly disappointed for me 😔😔😔

title: Heart Cam
description:
Heart Rate Monitor (Heart Cam):

    Free, instant, and accurate heart rate monitor.

How to use our heart rate monitor app:

1. How to measure
    * Please launch this app in a bright environment.
    * Gently cover the rear camera with your fingertips and keep it still for a few seconds.
    * The app will instantly measure your heartbeat waveform and calculate your heart rate.

2. How to set
    * The front or rear camera can be selected for measurement. When the rear camera is turned on, the flash can be used together to obtain a good signal-to-noise ratio measurement signal. If a front camera is used, we will disable the flash to avoid discomfort when it comes to the user's eyes.
    * You can set the heartbeat sound enabled, and when the app detect a complete heartbeat pulse, it will play a short sound effect.
    * Users can set the measurement time by themselves.

3. Historical records
    * Users can view the heartbeat records they have measured in the historical records.

4. Reference
    * Users can refer to the normal value of pulse rate for each age group.

title: Heart Rate / Pulse Monitor
description:
Heart Rate Monitor / Pulse Meter application, designed to be used by anyone and everywhere. 
Accurately measures your heart rate with ability for continuous monitoring feedback.
No additional hardware requirements. 
Can be used on any Android device with touch screen.

Sleek interface, easy to use.



From instructions within application:

Tap anywhere on screen every time you feel your pulse.
(result in under 10 seconds)

Continue tapping for continuous heart rate monitor feedback.

Easiest way to feel your pulse is to put your palm on your neck under the jaw.

Pause for 3 seconds to fully reset the monitor.











DISCLAIMER: No party associated with this application is liable for any possible damage to user's health or device, as a result of application usage, or interpretation of its output.

title: Blood Pressure Diary
description:
It’s not a secret that heart rate and blood pressure diary are the most important tools to help you know more about your health condition. And now it’s a best time to say no to paper diary. Keep track of your pulse and pressure measurements with the best heart rate and blood pressure journal app in a very easy way with a simple tap of a button!

Heart Rate Journal & Blood Pressure Diary app is the most powerful and easy to use assistant for daily recording of your pulse and arterial pressure. Updating your heart rate and bp diary only takes a few seconds of your time per day, but it will give you a lot of useful information about your health and will help you to be physically fit.

Normal pulse as well as arterial pressure varies from a person to person, but it’s very important to know and monitor your own heart rate per minute and blood pressure ranges. Everyone needs to know that abnormally fast resting heart rate (RHR) may signalize about tachycardia. And, otherwise, too slow heart rhythm can be symptom of bradycardia. High blood pressure, or hypertension, as well as low blood pressure, or hypotension, rarely have noticeable symptoms. And that's the main and very important reason why you have to keep a heart rate journal and bp diary regularly.

Blood Pressure Diary & Heart Rate Journal app already contains fields for your resting heart rate (RHR), heart rate after squats and arterial pressure tracking. But unlike most of the other blood pressure and heart rate diary apps the main advantage of this one is the ability to create and track your own parameters that you really need. Just add heart rate after eating, running or other exercise, blood pressure in the morning and in the evening, create blood pressure and sugar log or any other metrics you care about.

You can use heart rate and blood pressure diary app as your personal or family pulse and blood pressure logbook, as tool for detecting the days with the abnormally low or high blood pressure or just to keep track your resting heart rate (RHR) or your heart rate zones after exercise. Manage your own and everyone from your family health with the help of the best heart rate and blood pressure diary app.

Heart Rate Diary & Blood Pressure Journal free features:

- Heart rate diary
- Blood pressure diary
- Create your own custom heart rate and bp diary metrics
- Add useful and informative description to each of them
- Drag and drop parameters to sort them
- Delete unused parameters or move them to archive in order to maintain history
- Analyze your heart rate and bp diary and graphs
- Share your heart rate diary and blood pressure logbook with your doctor or your family
- Export your heart rate and blood pressure journal as a spreadsheet (.csv) file

Additional features:

- Weight Diary
- Body Sizes Diary
- Exercise Diary
- Drink Water Reminder
- Pedometer

Surprise! Just now as a gift along with the downloading Heart Rate Diary & Blood Pressure Journal app you are getting a free trial 14 days access to all of premium features to track other important health and fitness parameters. Just try to see how easy and useful it is.

Heart Rate & Blood Pressure Diary app is perfect for athletes and ordinary people who are fond of sports, gym or runners, for elderly and kids, for young boys and girls, for men and women.

title: iChoice SpO2 Pro
description:
This is a service for managing the personal health on measuring the SpO2, you need to use with the ChoiceMMed Bluetooth Pulse Oximeter.
This APP allows you to non-invasively measure blood oxygen saturation (SpO2) and pulse rate (PR); it's free of charge, and you can use the app to display, record and review the data you have measured. Also, you can click any point in the history trends to learn your measured data in detail, manage the personal health.

Features:

（1）        Establish a connection with the bluetooth pulse oximeter in one step 

（2）        Fast measurement and real-time display 

（3）        Track and trend your measurement history

SpO2%--the percentage of functional arterial blood oxygen saturation
Pulse Rate—the number of heart beats per minute(bpm)

Product information for the oximeter can be accessed at the ChoiceMMed official website: http://www.choicemmed.com/

title: My Vitals
description:
Start your day healthy!
New and expanded version of My VitalsTM – your health and medical information diary. 
My VitalsTM is one of the best health and fitness apps available. Easy to use health diary has features to save your readings for Blood Pressure, Blood Glucose, Oxygen Saturation, Pulse, Weight, Medical Reports and other important information related to health of you and your family.
You can create multiple profiles for your family members and other people in your care. Sharing data between family is simple and secure. With one click, you can also send data to your Doctors and health providers as needed.
Save your self's and family's health vitals, medical information, full medical data on a regular basis. You can save multiple profiles of all family members on one device and securely in cloud. My VitalsTM is a simple to use application to store your entire medical history and information in one safe place. Access your data anywhere, anytime.
What is new?
With feedback from our loyal users, we have introduced in this latest release following features:
  ● Track Blood Pressure separately from Pulse

  ● Oxygen Saturation

  ● Feature to delete or edit old data

  ● Improved analysis and graphs

  ● Simpler screens for medical reports


Free App! No advertisements! 
We genuinely care for your health, this is why you will find that there are absolutely no advertisements in our application. We do request and welcome your support. If you love this application, please give us a favorable rating, and also share the app with family, friends and people you know. Reach out and share with us how we can make this app even better for you.
Using My VitalsTM as your single authentic diary for health and fitness data.
Keep detailed records about your Health
  ● Quickly enter Blood Pressure, Pulse Rate, Blood Glucose, Oxygen Saturation, Weight

  ● Take a picture of your medical reports to save in your My VitalsTM profile and share as needed

  ● Your data and medical reports are stored encrypted on our secure cloud server

Easily and securely share data with:
  ● Family members

  ● Doctors and health care providers

See how is your Health doing over a period of time
  ● View charts for selected profile for the chosen duration

  ● Share and show this data to Doctor on each visit

Save your medical information and reports
  ● You can easily download or send your data

  ● All your heath information is available in one simple and secure cloud location

recentChanges: Introducing Group member records update feature. People added by you to My Vitals Group will be able to add, edit & delete your member's data and files.
comments: It takes a hell of long time to step back to 1957 using the date picker you use. Is there any way to remove unwanted boxes like blood glucose from the lists. Feedback function in the app doesn't work. Graphic scales on all graphs appear to run from 0 to 250, including temperature. Weight graph is a hundred pounds light.

I will happily change this to 5 stars if I can ever figure out how to analyze the vitals other than just weight and glucose. Easy to use app and I really love it except for not being able to figure out analytics. Also although I wish the weight chart was right, it is way off on the graph. Probably 100 lbs.

Good App. Suggestions for further improvement. 1. Should have single input screen for all vital signs. Data then should be displayed in respective vital signs report. 2. Graphs should have to ability to: A. Show hourly trends as well as weekly/ monthly / yearly trends. B. view all vital signs in one graph as well as selected vital signs only.
Simply excellent. Pls allow to record time of the day during which weight is taken. It is possible to compare weight during various times.

I think this app is great. It does what it says It's very easy to use. Although I would like to be able to print all my data within a date range in one report to send to my doctor. Also how do I retrieve my data in the cloud? Just updated and app keeps crashing and will not open.

title: Cardiac diagnosis (arrhythmia)
description:
If the measurement result is abnormal, please recommend an electrocardiogram(EKG,ECG) test.

[Guide to Access Permission for Using Cardiac Diagnosis App]

1. Camera (required)
- It is necessary to detect the blood circulation of the measurement site.

2. Storage space (required)
- It is necessary to save the measurement result.

3. Microphone (required)
- It is necessary to use recording function in real time measurement.

This app can detect heart rate and arrhythmia(Atrial fibrillation (AF or Afib)). 
So arrhythmia, bradycardia, and tachycardia are detected to show the state of the heart as normal, caution, and danger.
If the arrhythmia is detected recommends an overhaul in the hospital.

If the arrhythmia is detected,Get treatment.
Share the application with many people around you.
Even if the results come out as normal you can help prevent the disease should be checked regularly.

How to use - 
1. Gently place the tip of your finger on the camera lens
2. Click start button.

comments: Inaccurate. Gave it 2 stars because I like the idea of the app, but the heart rate was consistently 10-20 bpm above my Garmin heart rate monitor (which is trusted) and the actual pulse in my wrist - way off. The app consistently told me I have an arrhythmia, but said the same for everyone who tried it - including my red sofa cushion which is apparently also bradycardic lol. I'm sure I was on the camera lens well, and remained very still. If you download this app, don't take it too seriously.

Not sure what i think about this yet. Ive been having chest pain for over a mo now. This says arrhythmia & bradycardia then normal & tachycardia. Bradycardia is something I often have w/ 42-60bpm but ER says panic attacks not arrhythmia and tells me call a shrink! I STILL HAVE CHEST PAIN & KEEP PASSING OUT! Ugh
Keeps saying I have an arrhythmia, so I put it on my cats back, says her heart rate is 61 (not accurate) and that she has an arrythmia. Not even close, don't put any faith into this app at all people
I find this app to be more accurate than most of the others, unless i use it while i have cold hands, then of course it will only give innaccurate readings.
Locked me out since I would not allow it to have access to my audio device. There is no need for this to have access to my audio device.

title: Heart rate monitor
description:
Measure heart rate with your phone. It's easy with this heart rate monitor. You can save the results so that you can track your heart rate.

How does it work?
Place your index finger lightly over the camera lens of your mobile phone. Make sure the camera lens and flash are both covered. The flash may become hot. Don't press too hard. Press the button in the middle of the app and the heart rate monitor will start measuring your heart rate.

This is not a medical app, and the app is not approved by medical authorities. If in doubt about your health, please contact your doctor.

title: Heartbeat Checker & Health Monitor
description:
Heartbeat Checker & Health Monitor

Healthcare App : Heartbeat Checker or Heart Rate Monitor & Health Monitor

Please Note: This is not a medical device. In some devices, heart rate monitor may make the LED flash very hot.

This Healthcare App with Heartbeat Checker or Heart Rate Monitor & Health Monitor including Heartbeat Checker or Heart Rate Monitor, Pedometer or Step Counter and Eye Test is a very advanced Healthcare App.

Heart Rate or Heartbeat is an important measure in health and fitness and using this app you can monitor your Heart Rate or Heartbeat anytime. 

All you need to do is put your finger on the phone's camera and start this app. The  Heart Rate measuring will start in a couple of seconds. Covering a part of flash may help Heartbeat Counter to become more accurate.

Normal resting Heart Beat Rate for Adults ranges from 60 to 100 beats per minute (BPM). However, keep in mind that many factors can influence the heart rate, including Activity level, Fitness level, Body size, Emotion, etc.


FEATURES FOR HEARTBEAT CHECKER OR HEALTHCARE APP.

* Heartbeat Checker or Heart Rate Monitor :- This functions monitors your Heart Rate and stores all the data.

* Pedometer or Step Counter :- Pedometer & Step Counter is one of the best Health & Fitness app to stay fit. Using built-in sensor this app counts your steps and shows, Daily, Monthly & Yearly statistics to help you achieve your goal.

* Eye Test :- Eye Test, including Colorblindness Test, Astigmatism and Sensitivity Test helps you test your eyes and take the very best care of them

Get the all new and advanced Healthcare App : Heartbeat Checker or Heart Rate Monitor & Health Monitor for FREE!!

title: Instant Heart Rate
description:
Instant Heart Rate Monitor measures your heart rate by analyzing blood flow on the tip of your finger.

lightly place the tip of your finger on the camera lens so it completely covers the lens. Hold your phone steadily and press Start Button to begin measurement.

If your phone does not have flash, perform the measurement in well-lit environment.

title: FITZY+ (Fitness, Heart Health, Pulse Oximeter)
description:
Track your Fitness Level, Heart (cardiovascular) Health (heart rate, blood pressure, oxygen saturation) and all-day Activities using FITZY+ app. FITZY+ app helps you to live a healthy life by tracking your Fitness Sessions, all-day Activities and Cardiovascular Health using your smartphone's sensors. Your health parameters are automatically tracked and analysed in real-time using AI powered algorithms. - www.fitzy.plus

FEATURES :

○ Personalized Health Score.
○ Lifestyle and activity recommendations based on Health Score.
○ Real-time monitoring of activities, cardiovascular (heart & lung) health.

○ Cardiovascular health :
    ○ Heart Rate.
    ○ Blood Pressure.
    ○ Blood Oxygen Saturation (SpO2).
    ○ Cardiac Output.
    ○ Arterial Stiffness.

○ Cardio journal :
    ○ Automatic recording of analysed parameters when integrated/wearable based sensors are used.
    ○ Log externally recorded Blood Pressure data.

○ Activity tracking :
    ○ Move Minutes.
    ○ Steps Count.
    ○ Heart Points.
    ○ Calorie Count.
    ○ Distance, pace, elevation.

○ Fitness sessions
   ○ Manual and automatic tracking of fitness sessions.
   ○ Submit data to Google Fit. 

SUPPORTED DEVICES :

○ Supported handsets: 
    ○ Devices with Android 8.0 (Oreo API level 26) or higher is required.

○ Supported handsets (for integrated cardiovascular analysis)
    ○ Samsung Galaxy S series : S10 Plus, S10, S9 Plus, S9, S8 Plus, S8, S7, S7 Edge.
    ○ Samsung Galaxy Note series : Note 9 , Note 8.
    ○ Samsung wearable : coming soon.

While the fitness related features work in all handsets, automated cardiovascular analysis feature is supported in handsets with compatible sensors.

Samsung Galaxy S and Note users can measure Heart Rate, Oxygen Saturation, Blood Pressure, Cardiac Output using handset's integrated sensors.

NOTICE:

Caution! The information gathered from Samsung devices and/or related software is not intended for use in the diagnosis of disease or other conditions, or in the cure, mitigation, treatment or prevention of disease. The accuracy of the information and data provided by these devices and related software, including heart rate readings, may be affected by factors such as environmental conditions, skin condition, specific activity performed while wearing the device, settings of the device, user configuration/user provided information, sensor placement, and other end-user interactions. Please refer to the user manual for each device for more information on proper wear and use.

comments: Awesome features and fairly accurate. Now I can log my daily workouts and cardiac health in single app. First time setup and calibration takes up ~2mins but it is worth. I wonder how a good app like this is free (even no ads while using the app). I won't mind paying for this app. Good work. Recommended.

I have an S10+. Calibration did not work well. It would not calibrate unless I said my heartrate was 100. It was really around 65 - 70. Once it finally calibrated, it said my heartrate was always 100. It makes me question the other markers.
Terrible. Asks for every data permission under the sun then fails to calibrate after 3 minutes, repeatedly. I downloaded this for Spo2 measurements and it didn't work.
I've tried running the calibration several times & it keeps saying it has to do it again. Uninstalled.
Garbage, 3 min to configure which never complete process. Avoid

title: Pulsometer RR
description:
(translation not revised)

ANT+/Bluetooth 4.0 heart rate monitor and HRV. App to monitoring pulse. 

Heart Rate Monitor for ANT+ & Bluetooth 4.0. Uses sensor to monitor your heart (compatible devices only). 
Features: 
      -Quiet Basic fat burning / aerobic 
      -Custom zone letting you know how long you've been in a range that have marked your HR. 
      -HR Maximum and average heart rate 
      -Calories consumed, you can change the type of activity at any time (football, running, etc ..). 
       -HR zones: Percentage in real time.
       -HR Courage absolute and percentage always available, click on the center marker to change the absolute value of the percentage, however always have the two data visible though a smaller one than the other. 
      -How To ALWAYS ACTIVE DISPLAY: keeps the screen always on so you can see your pulse at any time. In this way the wallpaper is black and only the pulse is, so you can always see your pulse without searching for the button on your device. When you enter this double tap the screen to activate ON mode so you can see the rest of the plot markers and the last 10 minutes. 
      -Quick to toggles  without entering the configuration menu (sound, screen always on and enable/disable power saving).
      -Historial activities with advanced statistics. 
      -Sync all data with Google Drive.
      -Backup and restore features

(new) -Module HRV: Find your heart rate variability data in 5 minutes and export your data to import into desktop programs as Kubios, ARTiiFACT or HRVAS. Unique ANT + application on Google Play which allows you to export your data RR without integrated application purchases.

      -And soon more! send me your ideas beetlesoft.development@gmail.com 

Will be FREE only in early access mode.

BLUETOOTH 4.0 PREREQUISITES:
   -Android versión >= Jellybean 
   -Bluetooth 4.0 adapter.

Also compatible with this Polar devices (with visibility activated):
   -H6 
   -H7 

NOTE: BLUETOOTH 4.0 = BLUETOOTH LE = BLUETOOTH SMART = BLE


For more ANT+ info go to http://www.thisisant.com/directory

comments: Great App for monitoring my HR & HRV, I'm able to see my exertion across Zones and export. But opening the file gives me a media app instead of the data. Please share how to export RR data so that Kubios can import/read it. I emailed as well with more details. Thanks

I like this app a lot. However, today's update made it to where the phone vibrates every second the whole time it's on?? Very annoying, and I didn't see any way to turn it off, except by turning the phone's entire vibration off while I am working out. Please fix!
Excellent app! Works great with my Garmin ANT + heart rate sensor. I do a lot of HIIT in the gym and also I do boxing, this app allows me to stay in my heart rate zone.
Was fantastic, but recent Android 10 update on a Samsung phone breaks it. No longer syncs with my Garmin ANT+ chest strap. It needs the updated Garmin library to work on Samsung phones.
It is great app. Gives great representation of heart rate dynamics....Clearly shows which heart rate level to sustain for better performance....

title: StressScan: heart rate monitoring and stress test
description:
Just place a finger over the camera for two minutes, and StressScan will analyze changes in your heart rate interval and scientifically measure the level of your mental and physical stress on a scale of 1 to 100.

- What is the principle behind StressScan? − 
Many of the functions essential to maintaining human health are controlled by the autonomic nervous system. It is medically recognized that the balance of the autonomic nervous system can become disordered through fatigue and other stress, stemming from causes such as work and human relationships. By analyzing the waveform of your heartbeat as measured at the fingertip, StressScan can analyze the balance of your autonomic nervous system and measure your stress level on a stress index of 1 to 100.

- You can trust Stress Scan! - 
The technology used by Stress Scan is based on heart rate variability analysis, which is widely recognized in the field of heart rate analysis and autonomic nervous system research. 
Although heart rate variability analysis technology is not yet generally well known, many medical institutions and companies have taken an interest and are beginning to put it to use. The technology is seeing use even at the cutting edge of stress care, including adoption by the US military to treat post-traumatic stress disorder (PTSD) in soldiers returning from the battlefield, and by NASA for astronaut training and health management.

- Usable in a range of scenarios! - 
· Periodic checking of daily stress level
· Checking the effects of favorite meals and drinks on stress
· Checking relaxation while traveling or at a favorite spot

- Device compatibility -
StressScan is intended for use with a camera- and flash-equipped smartphone. It is not usable with devices that do not have a camera and flash.

- Usage environment -
An Internet connection is required to use StressScan. External support for measurement functions is used for complex stress analysis.

recentChanges: bugfixes
comments: Scanner takes 3 minutes and if it thinks your finger moved at all it restart. It can be very frustrating and obviously a probability towards the accuracy of the final scan. I'm still sticking with it I'm going to give it a 30-day trial I'm halfway through that. I find it useful but I do think that you should be able to add more tags.

This is a good app. I compared the results using Samsung Health stress meter ( I use a Note phone which has a heart rate monitor), and they were fairly accurate. Even the heart rate was accurate to the beat if 2-3 beats per minute. I tested in resting conditions, after exercise, ( where the HRV is minimal, so stress is maximum) and Samsung Health stress results and this app results match perfectly.

This app's heart rate is pretty accurate, but the stress level is just useless. Even if I measure in the middle of a severe panic attack, it says I have low stress. Half the app is in English, half is some Asian language. Not recommended for stress measurement

The ability to use camera for heart rate is very innovative. The app checks the variance of the heart rate from the median and has some predefined set of calculations to get the percentage. This may not be accurate way to calculate mental stress, but the condition of the heart. However, the bpm shown is perfect. So 4 stars, but 1 star less because the stress percentage is not always accurate. It shows different values when taken one after another for me.
This is a must have app. It helps you to monitor your stress levels! The monthly calendar is great so you can see how well you are doing at managing your stress. High recommend!

title: Pulse Control BLE
description:
Tiny app which allows you to control your heart rate during the workout.
You need just to specify LOW and HIGH pulse threshold. The app beeps using two different sounds if your heart rate is out of range.

App works only with BLE (Bluetooth Low Energy) devices.

comments: This app was great... But now it no longer works since my phone received the Android 10 update. I get a message saying the app was built for an older version of Android, and the scan no longer finds and devices. 😐

Wanted an app to track my heart rate after my workout is over to see how long recovery is taking. Wahoo and Strava don't seem to have the ability to display heart rate when I am not actively working out, so this nice little app fills that purpose perfectly. It paired with my Coospo chest strap HRM with no problem.
Does not do anything with my fitbit. Seems to connect but no sounds.
Just what I was looking for. Simple min  max heart rate alarm. Wahoo Bluetooth chest strap connected straight away. Brilliant. Thankyou
Work perfectly, simple & easy to use.

title: Pulse Remote Health
description:
RIMPulse© (Remote Interactive Monitoring from Pulse) is a comprehensive integrated system designed to monitor patient’s vital signs remotely, allowing better health care, more rapid interaction, better doctor-patient relationship and higher cure rates. 
The system components include HealthIntact© (a medically specialized server application), mobile-based application, PC-based application and hardware sensor devices (ECG, Heart Rate, Skin Temperature, etc…) and their accessories.
In RIMPulse system the patient is connected to vital signs sensors that is connected to his mobile phone, laptop, tablet or PC; which in turn acts as a hub sending data to HealthIntact© server allowing instant doctor/patient interaction. In such case the Samples of patient’s vital signs (while leading his normal life) are continuously being sent to his medical record on the server. On the other side, doctors can follow up patients either in near real time or offline. 
While In case a patient feels an attack, he can press the “EVENT” button in our sensing device. That will elicit pushing (sending) an emergency sample of his CURRENT recordings, to his attending doctor's mobile, containing a configurable duration of his latest recordings (e.g. last 5 minutes). His doctor receives it, and react based on the case state.

His doctor receives it, and react based on the case state.
summary: Pulse Remote Health

Great application in monitoring heart problems

title: Heart Rate Monitor
description:
Innovative display and documentation of the heart rate in combination with a Bluetooth Smart chest belt. 
   After the configuration of the individual settings and training zones, and a connection to the chest belt the heart rate is visualized as an absolute value of beats per minute and as a percentage of the stored maximum heart rate value of the user. Additionally, the deviation (variability) of the separate heart beats is displayed in milliseconds. The different training zones are individually colored and easily comprehensible.
   After starting the recording, the statistical values (MAX, AVG, and MIN) are updated continuously. Furthermore, the intensity of the training (TRIMP, CR10, kcal, a timeline of HR, zone duration) is displayed as an accumulated sum, as percentages, and as a graph.
   Recorded training sessions can be documented and shared in several ways like Dropbox, email, or others. The recording produces a summary of training results as a PDF file and a CSV file containing the raw training data.
   Best results will be achieved with the recommended chest belt from BM innovations GmbH.

Best results will be achieved with the recommended chest belt from BM innovations GmbH.
summary: Heart rate monitor, innovative and smart in combination with a BLE chest strap
recentChanges: Fixed bugs
comments: I tried a different app first and paid to get a chart facility to discover that if there is a temporary disconnect with the chest strap the app had to be restarted. Then I found this app. Charting is free. And it reconnects. It does the job. My only gripe is that it hides the files it creates. It uploads from the app but it would be nicer to use a sync program I use for other files.

The readings are inaccurate. By a wide margin. Max heart rate on a garmin watch using the polar h10 and an oura ring was 79. This app said 125. Graphing could be better. Being able to zoom would be good. When I try to load an overnight dataset the app crashes.

Excellent and simple to use app. I use it with my scosche rhythm plus and it works perfectly. The graphs and charts are simple to follow. I also use it to record my heart rate which I sleep. There is also an option to export the results to pdf or csv. Definitely the best free fitness apps. 🙂

This appears to identical to the Acentas app, other than differences in the interface design. I liked the Acentas version, it does all I need. The biggest problem with it and this app is that it doesn't save data as you go. If the app crashes or is inadvertently closed then all data for that session is lost. To say that this is irritating after a six-hour cycle ride is to understate things. This version of the app shows a slightly lower BMP than Acentas, and is probably more accurate.
Simple. Connects all the time. Could use for sleep, all day long, whatever. Just a continuos running graph, which the fancier apps don't do. Nice.

title: Vital Signs Blood Pressure Log
description:
If you use a blood pressure monitor,  log your results in this free app to see how medication and diet are affecting your body. Unlike activity monitors, it focuses on your important vital signs: blood pressure, pulse, breathing rate, and temperature. Unlike most 'free' apps it's actually ad-free, does not use your data plan, and does not share your information. You can choose to email your blood pressure log to someone you trust. Try it out. It's Free!

recentChanges: * Add 3-days as chart option
comments: Wonderful app for Zoom or Telephone Doctor appointments. I will use it for that reason. Gathering my medical data for tomorrow's visit, I find that weight and Oxygen saturation had to be written under comments. Overall, after doing patient care for 38 years, I find this app to be very thorough. Many thanks for organizing my vitals presentation.

Love the simple functionality. Great way to keep track of your own vitals. I would give it a 5 star if we can track more than one person. Ideal for care givers who care for other people... like grandparents or their kids!

Just the right amount of information! I wanted an app that wasn't overwhelming with graphs and charts that I don't understand and that I can email to my doctor. This app does just that! You can also write notes to yourself like... Left arm, sitting, morning, etc. Did I mention that there are NO ADS! Yes, would highly recommend this app.

Simple to input and retrieve data, no ads, no frills, very quick to load and takes little memory or battery. Other than sending a text email of your readings if you choose to do so, it does not use any data. Only thing that needs improvement is the note line - it is difficult to read what has been entered sometimes. If I could request something it would be a meds field to log what taken based on readings.

Wish numbers were assigned to all preset horizontal lines. I have to estimate purpose not knowing value or purpose....what is secret to getting preset horizontal lines to have a value? Rarely does it show up for me .

title: myWorkouts Heart Rate Monitor Sport GPS Tracker
description:
myWorkouts records your sports activities (movements via GPS, heart rate via Bluetooth® or ANT+™ sensor).

Outdoor-Sport

Out on the road? Download free maps for offline use and use them anywhere without a mobile network.
Ideal for hiking, mountain biking, pedelec, eBike and road cycling, mountaineering or mountain climbing, on a ski tour, cross-country skiing or nordic walking.
You always know where you are and where you came from.
Find out how far and fast you were on the road and the incline of the tour.
Share tracks as a GPX file with friends.
Download GPX tracks and take them as a template for mountain biking, mountain biking, ski tours and hiking or tracking.
Export your workouts as GPX or FIT file to import in sport portals like STRAVA, Velo Hero and the like.
Find new ways on the maps.

You do not need to be a super-sportsman and can also use the app in a foreign city to find the parking or hotel (map).
The download of offline maps goes directly from the app.

Indoor-Sport

Keep fit during the winter and continue training, e.g. at the treadmill, indoor cycling, cross-trainer or rowing machine!
Use myWorkouts as a tachometer and view your heart rate (Bluetooth or ANT+ sensor required), cadence, calorie consumption during exercise so your training is efficient and you remain motivated.

Get motivated

Follow your activities and let yourself be motivated by statistics on higher achievements.
Use the resting heart rate and the maximum pulse to calculate your optimal training zones (for effective cardio training with optimal heart rate).
During the exercise, you can see how long you have exercised in the planned intensity and how much calories you burned.
You can feel the performance increases everywhere, whether mountain bike MTB, running, mountain running, indoor cycling, ergometer, treadmill, rowing machine or fitness training.

For me?

The app is ideal for mountain and bike sports enthusiasts who run mountain bikes or racing bikes in summer, running, mountaineering and hiking, and in winter they keep their fitness with indoor cycling, treadmills, steppers, cross-trainers, etc.
GPX tracks can quickly be viewed and saved with the app. With the offline map, you can orient yourself with the GPX tracks.
Stay fit with the app!

Track data

Whether indoor fitness or outdoor sports - you can record this:

- GPS track (geo coordinates), route, altitude, speed, slope, altitude, export in GPX format
- heart rate (*) measures pulse (course, min, max, average, time zones), Bluetooth and ANT+ sensors supported
- calorie consumption (*) shows burned calories
- cadence and or speed (*)
- step frequency, distance, number of steps, calorie consumption, speed
- environment temperature (*)
- barometric pressure (*)

(*) Some of the values require additional sensors (ANT+™ or Bluetooth® LE)!

Note
You can use myWorkouts without additional devices, but some features (heart rate, calories, cadence) are only active if you have a chest strap that sends your heart rate via ANT+ or Bluetooth.
Then you need:

- an ANT+ or Bluetooth LE heart rate monitor
- a smartphone with ANT+ or Bluetooth Low Energy
- ANT+ or Bluetooth LE combined speed and cadence sensor
- ANT+ or Bluetooth LE cadence sensor
- ANT+ or Bluetooth LE speed sensor
- ANT+ step frequency sensor (foot pod, distance measurement, calorie counter)
- ANT+ temperature sensor

Install now the free app and record your tours and tracks via GPS along with heart rate (Bluetooth or ANT+) and cadence. Download the free offline maps! Use the app for your indoor training. Here we go!

recentChanges: Bugfixes and minor improvements, especially regarding export of workouts.
comments: I like the app. Linked to my cheapo CooSpu chest band ($30) without prob. Really just use it to track pulse but selectable target ranges are nice. Kcal doesn't match my StairMaster, it is consistantly 20% higher, which is nice actually. Tracks weekly time, time in zone and number of workouts and saves it. I don't export stuff, but I think it can. Not sure what creator gets out of all this, maybe an evangelistic health nut?

Simple interface yet very useful and satisfying user expectations. I still can't believe there's no annoying popup ads. Even this app doesn't have pro version as it's already been providing full features. I'm using myWorkouts with chest strap hr monitor. No problems with connection. Will try with gps feature soon.

A high quality app that's free? Where's the catch? As far as I can tell, none! Works with my off-brand HRM. Intuitive user interface. This deserves ten stars out of five! One wish: I actually paid to get my RMR measured and I would like to be able to put it in. So unimportant but if it's an easy win, put it in the backlog! 😋
Very informative and good features. It would be really nice to add a picture at the end of a workout to capture the gym equipment information.
Great App. Not 100% sold on actual calories burned. My Zone and other apps say I burned more calories but I workout harder using this app because I feel this app may be more accurate.

title: Pulsometer
description:
The program allows you to measure pulse, to calculate heart rate zones, to conduct the measurement log.
The program provides information about the training in different areas of the pulse.

Using the program is very simple:
1) Pick up the phone in his hand, his other hand to feel the pulse at the wrist.
2) Click on the measurement button (the heart), countdown (3,2,1), get ready.
3) Starts counting the pulse at the wrist
4) Once you have reached the count of the number of (15 in the default settings specified), press the measuring button again
5) On the screen you will see your heart rate and your heart rate zone, if it was designed before

Stay healthy!

description:
[OXiM SpO2] is a dedicated app for the pulse oximeter “S-127 series” of SEASTER. 
 Your blood oxygen level and pulse rate are easily recorded with the app through Bluetooth. All recorded data are automatically made into a graph for your daily health management.
 
Download the app and connect your device to the pulse oximeter with Bluetooth. Your blood oxygen level and pulse rate will be automatically recorded at the time of launching this app.

All recorded data can be easily recorded and made into the graph and list.

title: Blood Pressure Tracker - BP Checker - BP Logger
description:
Manage Your Blood Pressure, Weight, BMI, Blood Glucose Level, Heart Rate, Sugar Level, spo2, bp & Diabetes at once by Free Blood Pressure App!

Control your blood pressure with multiple build-in features like measurements analysis, statistics, graphs, comprehensive reports your doctor will love and many other tools to analyze high or low blood pressure! 

Blood Pressure Checker Diary : BP Tracker History Log, Controls blood pressure & blood sugar level with multiple build-in features like measurements analysis, statistics, graphs, comprehensive reports doctor will love & many other tools to analyze high or low blood pressure value. Blood Pressure Control.

Control high blood pressure (i.e., Hypertension) with blood pressure monitor : bp checker app!
 
Features:
  
💓 Log blood pressure & pulse readings using fast keyboard data entry.
💓 Understand what the numbers mean & monitor blood pressure trends with statistics & interactive charts.
💓 Send blood pressure PDF reports to your physician/doctor.
💓 Set up reminders to take blood pressure measurements or medication.
💓 Export or import blood pressure data in CSV format for easy data interchange with other applications e.g. Microsoft Excel.
💓 Manage blood pressure records of multiple profiles (great for caregivers).
💓 Support for common blood pressure classification guidelines (ACC/AHA, ESH/ESC, JNC).
💓 Keep your data safe with automatic backups.
💓 Configurable date/time formats & measurement units.
  
Simple and Easy to use:
 
1. You can easily log and track systolic, diastolic and pulse by just swiping your finger.
2. You can easily add your tags (e.g., irregular heartbeat, cuff location like left/right arms, seated/reclined).
3. You can easily search your data (e.g., by date, tags, and bloodpressure zones).
Blood Pressure Diary : Evaluation Info Log History Tracker has been made for the people who need constant management for Blood Pressure, weight and blood glucose.

According to American Heart Association (AHA), normal range of blood pressure are Systolic 91 ~ 120 mmHg and Diastolic 61 ~ 80 mmHg. Please enjoy our blood pressure log and tracker app.


Organized:
- In order to be organized & use hand sets for health, use specially designed - BP info tool. Add notes, postures, location along with body weight & glucose with Blood Pressure - BP INFO.

History:
- Always have an access to older records with Blood Pressure Info App.

Trends:
- Can see trends on line graphs & bar graph with date & compare statistics on graph & control High Blood Pressure.

Data Record:
- You are able to enter your BP, weight & blood glucose data & view those records in graphs & lists.

Report:
- BP Journal App announces the analyzed changes & the average value of total entered data in 7 days, 30 days & 60 days.

Goal setting:
- You are able to set the target for your Blood Pressure & weight value.

Graph:
- You are able to view the measured data as a whole graph divided by year, month, week & day.

Diary & Memo:
- By entering a memo in the recorded data, you are able to record thought at the moment of measurement

Alarm:
- Do you keep forgetting to take the medicine? BP Diary provides a time alarm to take a medicine & a notification.

Note: This app DOES NOT measure blood pressure nor Blood Pressure History. To measure blood pressure reliably, use a clinically-validated blood pressure monitor. It is not possible to measure blood pressure with fingerprint scanner on the smart phone.

Once every two or three months was bad enough but lately, I've had to do the uninstall-reinstall dance every time I want my tracker to sync with the app. Completely unacceptable and leaves me with a worthless tracker since I can't see any of the data without the app. Update: updates resolved connectivity issues for a while but they've returned

title: FibriCheck - Check your heart, prevent strokes
description:
Check your heart rhythm with the medically certified FibriCheck app on your smartphone. Keep an eye on the health of your heart, detect cardiac arrhythmias in good time, and avoid complications such as a stroke. Have you been diagnosed with cardiac arrhythmia in the past? You can also use the app to monitor your arrhythmia.


Measure your heart rhythm with your smartphone


• Quick and easy: It takes just 60 seconds to check your heart rhythm. Place your finger on the camera of your smartphone, and put your mind at ease.

• No need for another device: All you need to take measurements is your smartphone.

• Measure whenever you want: Are you experiencing symptoms, such as palpitations? Open the app and take a measurement immediately.

• Regular measurements: With FibriCheck, you can measure your heart rhythm twice daily. This way any changes in your heart rhythm will be detected more quickly.

• Notifications: Set up notifications for your measurements.


Request a review of your measurements


• Reports:  After your measurement, we will send you a detailed report with clear advice.

• Share your results with your doctor:  You can easily share the medical report with your family doctor or cardiologist. Please note: in Australia and America, FibriCheck can only be used under the supervision of a licensed healthcare practitioner.

• Medical experts:  Has our app detected an irregular measurement? Ask our team of medical experts to review your results.


Medically developed and approved


• Developed on the basis of PPG: PPG is a technique with ECG quality that uses light to detect cardiac arrhythmias. It measures changes in the size of your blood vessels by using the flash of your smartphone camera. These are then converted into heart rhythm measurements.

• Developed together with doctors: FibriCheck was developed in collaboration with a reputable Belgian hospital and university.

• Medically approved: FibriCheck is trusted by doctors and researchers worldwide thanks to its CE marking and FDA and TGA approvals. Please note: in Australia and America, FibriCheck can only be used under the supervision of a licensed healthcare practitioner.

• Approved by ORCHA: ORCHA, the world's leading health app evaluation & advisor organisation, gave us a quality score of 85%.


Try FibriCheck free of charge for 24 hours. After that, you can keep an eye on your heart’s health starting from € 3,99 per month.
 (Note that exact prices can vary depending on your location, currency and exchange rates.)

The FibriCheck application has FDA and TGA approvals and is a fully-fledged Class IIa medical device under the Medical Devices Directive (93/42/EEC).
Its manufacturer, Qompium nv, is ISO 13485:2016 certified.


The instructions for use are available in the app and on our website: https://pages.fibricheck.com/ifu/app
descriptionHTML:
Check your heart rhythm with the medically certified FibriCheck app on your smartphone. Keep an eye on the health of your heart, detect cardiac arrhythmias in good time, and avoid complications such as a stroke. Have you been diagnosed with cardiac arrhythmia in the past? You can also use the app to monitor your arrhythmia.


Measure your heart rhythm with your smartphone


• Quick and easy: It takes just 60 seconds to check your heart rhythm. Place your finger on the camera of your smartphone, and put your mind at ease.

• No need for another device: All you need to take measurements is your smartphone.

• Measure whenever you want: Are you experiencing symptoms, such as palpitations? Open the app and take a measurement immediately.

• Regular measurements: With FibriCheck, you can measure your heart rhythm twice daily. This way any changes in your heart rhythm will be detected more quickly.

• Notifications: Set up notifications for your measurements.


Request a review of your measurements


• Reports: After your measurement, we will send you a detailed report with clear advice.

• Share your results with your doctor: You can easily share the medical report with your family doctor or cardiologist. Please note: in Australia and America, FibriCheck can only be used under the supervision of a licensed healthcare practitioner.

• Medical experts: Has our app detected an irregular measurement? Ask our team of medical experts to review your results.


Medically developed and approved


• Developed on the basis of PPG: PPG is a technique with ECG quality that uses light to detect cardiac arrhythmias. It measures changes in the size of your blood vessels by using the flash of your smartphone camera. These are then converted into heart rhythm measurements.

• Developed together with doctors: FibriCheck was developed in collaboration with a reputable Belgian hospital and university.

• Medically approved: FibriCheck is trusted by doctors and researchers worldwide thanks to its CE marking and FDA and TGA approvals. Please note: in Australia and America, FibriCheck can only be used under the supervision of a licensed healthcare practitioner.

• Approved by ORCHA: ORCHA, the world's leading health app evaluation & advisor organisation, gave us a quality score of 85%.


Try FibriCheck free of charge for 24 hours. After that, you can keep an eye on your heart’s health starting from € 3,99 per month.
(Note that exact prices can vary depending on your location, currency and exchange rates.)

The FibriCheck application has FDA and TGA approvals and is a fully-fledged Class IIa medical device under the Medical Devices Directive (93/42/EEC).
Its manufacturer, Qompium nv, is ISO 13485:2016 certified.


The instructions for use are available in the app and on our website: https://pages.fibricheck.com/ifu/app
summary: Check your heart rhythm & detect arrhythmias with FibriCheck on your smartphone!
recentChanges: Added the possibility to measure your heart rhythm with your Samsung Galaxy Watch3
comments: This is possibly worth the subscription if you have a known cardiac issue. Otherwise it's very expensive. What really concerns me is the amount of data I handed over for a 24hr trial period.

One day free trial, no way of cancelling! Treid following the instructions as per the faq pg. Web address they gave comes up as error/access denied pg. I manually typed in the address, same again. Clicked on my subscriptions as per the instructions. Takes me to where I MUST sign up for either essential or premium package WITH NO 'CANCEL MY SUBSCRIPTIONS' IN SIGHT! And takes u bk to the app repeatedly! Taken screenshots to prove there is no 'cancel my subscription' anywhere at all in sight.
Just started using this app and finding it very helpful,, clear instructions and simple to use x

I've only been using the app for a few days but so far it is giving me a lot of information about how my heart is doing. I had a cardio ablation 3 months ago but I fear that I have gone back into AF in the last week.
Very good. It is just easy to use it and the report shows technical information from science. I would recommend to all.

title: EMAY Bluetooth Pulse Oximeter
description:
The App is specially designed for EMAY Bluetooth Pulse Oximeter for the user to download, view and share your SpO2 and Pulse Rate data. 

1. Allows users to transfer the SpO2 & heart rate data from EMAY Bluetooth Pulse Oximeter to smart phones. 
2. Review historical SpO2 & heart rate intuitively on the app 
3. Generate professional SpO2 report and share with others easily

Very easy to navigate and allows you monitor heart rate and oxygen levels in bar graph or line graph form. If you have the Emay bluetooth pulse oxymeter, you need this app to give you access to all of it's wonderful features.
App should have a way to do short tests without storing the data. Maybe do not store data until test lasts more then minute.
It is NOT a pulse oximeter. It only records if you already have one.
Lowest cost blue tooth recording unit I have found.
Very bad Deceptive

title: BP Journal - Blood Pressure Diary
description:
BP Journal app serves as a companion app to your home blood pressure monitor. The app lets you log your blood pressure readings, view trends, and send reports to your physician or professional healthcare provider. With multi-profile support, track blood pressure of other members of your family too.

Note: This app DOES NOT measure blood pressure. To measure blood pressure reliably, use a clinically-validated blood pressure monitor (with an inflatable cuff).

Features
● Log blood pressure and pulse readings using fast keyboard data entry
● Understand what the numbers mean and monitor blood pressure trends with statistics and interactive charts 
● Send blood pressure PDF reports to your physician/doctor
● Set up reminders to take blood pressure measurements or medication
● Export or import blood pressure data in CSV format for easy data interchange with other applications e.g. Microsoft Excel
● Manage blood pressure records of multiple profiles (great for caregivers)
● Support for common blood pressure classification guidelines (ACC/AHA, ESC/ESH, JNC7, Hypertension Canada, WHO/ISH, NICE, and more)
● Keep your data safe with automatic backups to Google Drive 
● Configurable measurement units
● Dark theme option
● Comprehensive online user guide

Privacy note
Your privacy is important to us. Your health data is never shared outside of the app without your consent.

recentChanges:
Version 2.1.5:
• Fixed a DST-related issue when manually setting date/time for a reading.
comments: Excellent app for recording blood pressure; nice and simple to use; clean and tidy; and a choice of dark or light themes which I always appreciate! You can record as many readings as you like, and as well as the usual systolic & diastolic you can record pulse, blood oxygen, blood glucose, and weight. There's a brilliant statistics section that gives you averages, minimum & maximum readings over a certain time period, and then some graphs which are useful as well. Excellent!

Easy to use. But the field "note" cannot be export properly. The field was use for glucose fasting when export to csv. Suggest to add custom field for text note. And custom field (editable name) to draw trend for customizable parameters. Such as body fat etc. 20201016, Appreciated for the quick fix! This app deserves a 5 Star rating. Cheers.

It's a perfect app for keeping track of blood pressure. The only issue I have is when I reboot my phone, it comes up with like 10 straight reminders to take my blood pressure. I do have reminders set for 9:45 am, 3 pm and 7 pm.

Works well enough I paid the couple bucks to get rid of ads. After a few weeks I exported to PDF and took that printout with me to the doctor, and it was very helpful for him to have that data so clearly laid out.
Great app, does exactly what you need and that is to record your blood pressure. The reminders facility is also an added bonus. Finally the report that it generates are very useful and easy to view.

title: Heartener®: hear your heartbeat 💜 meditate, sleep
description:
- Hear the effects of meditation as you focus only on the sound of your heart.
- Eliminate racing thoughts as you fall asleep by focusing only on the sound of your heart. 
- Hear the effect of your workout on your heart rate as you exercise.

Heartener® uses the heart rate sensors on your Wear OS device to translate your heart rate into a sound that is played on the Android phone paired with the watch. If your heart rate moves outside a range you select on the app, a very loud siren alert will automatically sound. You can also manually trigger this alert sound from your watch or on the companion app running on your phone.

Using the heart rate information is transmitted to your phone, every 5 seconds, the heartbeat sound effect is played based on the latest heart rate received. The pitch of the heart beat sound is lower for slower heart rates, and gets higher as the heart rate increases. The color of the heart rate text display varies from green to bright orange depending on the heart rate beats per minute.

To begin the Heartener session, first open Heartener on your phone. Open Heartener on your Wear OS device, and tap Activate. You'll get voice confirmation the session has begun, and within a few seconds the first heart rate data will be transmitted. To end the session, tap De-Activate on your watch, and your phone will give you voice confirmation the session has ended.

Heartener requires your authorization for vital signs sensor data access on your Wear OS device. Heartener will not function if the paired phone is locked or in sleep mode. No health information ever leaves your devices, no account creation is needed and the app contains no analytics tracking your usage.

comments: I can't connect my Samsung Gear S3 to this app, and it does not show up on Wear OS. Can you help me out with this?
No instructions for setting this up

title: Blood Pressure : BP Records Analyze Control Diary
description:
Blood Pressure Application helps the users to maintain the average records of their blood pressure. Launch the application enter the Blood Pressure values in both systolic and diastolic units along with the heart rate pulse BPM and press the save button. User can also define custom tags while saving the values, add notes while saving the blood pressure. The application will maintain these records in tabular form in order to represent the saved value. View and analyze the entered values of blood pressure and make a health plan accordingly. The application is a complete health diary for user to follow and monitor the blood pressure in order to stay heathy.

Key features of application:

🏥 User friendly simple and attractive user interface.
🏥 Modify edit and save the blood pressure records.
🏥 Add notes while entering the values.
🏥 Define custom tags to associate the entered values with.
🏥 Adjust date or time while entering the blood pressure.
🏥 Setup complete profile by entering age, weight and other details.
🏥 Add short description while saving the Blood pressure.
🏥 This application supports multiple users.
🏥 Application represents records through interactive charts.
🏥 Obtains Statistical and analytical reports.
🏥 Export reports with this application in the format of your choice.
🏥 Share reports with the doctor and discuss medical history.
🏥 Set reminders to check blood pressure regularly with authentic devices
🏥 Set multiple parameters/filters while monitoring values.
🏥 Blood Pressure info and guidelines to provide necessary info regarding the entered values.
🏥 View data in variopus forms as charts reports and analysis in the form of graphs.
🏥 Set profile and calculate BMI in order to get healthy.
Note :
This is diary tracking application which is only designed to save and analyze the entered value. This application is not designed to measure the values, we suggest the users to use authentic device for this purpose.

comments: I rate this app negative 5 stars. The bp monitor gives false readings. I do not trust even the bp log portion of this app because if the developer is going to include a false monitor knowing someone's life could be on the line, there is no telling what the dev may try to do to you or your phone through this app. I'm uninstalling and running a battery of IT scans.
It seems nice, but I am not sure how accurate the reading is. Each time my physical therapist takes my bp it is higher than this reading.

The reason why I only give 3 stars is because it only can keep up with your true blood pressure from the machine but you cannot take your blood pressure with this app and it tells you the truth up on it but great to keep up what once was and now
First try the only thing bad was having to go back 100s of slide to get 60 year to enter date of birth other than that i love being able to track & keep my monitoring chart close with this app

Not the best in order to see your values you have to quit the program and then go right back into it because of pop-up ads that won't go away Plus if you take your readings one after another safe four times 5 times in a row the values that you get are all over the map they're not even close

title: Blood pressure App
description:
The language of your blood pressure diary is english . The app supports other languages too ! 
New:
- In the settings now a line for normal blood pressure, high blood pressure and hypertension 1 can be activated. These lines then appear in the graphic.

With our blood pressure diary you will always have an overview about your heart rate / pulse, and store data such as systolic blood pressure, diastolic blood pressure, and heart rate as a note. Date and time of collection of blood pressure data are also saved.

Just create a profile in your blood pressure app and then you can start saving your blood pressure data  immediately as an overview.

This is how you always find out if you have a hypertension. After 7 entries you can also call a statistic.

You can also send the blood pressure data via e-mail to your doctor and even print it out.

Our blood pressure app will be constantly improved. If you have any suggestions for improvement, please send us an email.

comments: F. Zander : I downloaded your app to MEASURE my Blood Pressure..Not make log entries. Not even close to what I wanted. Uninstalled. F. Zander ; I read your response to my review. Your app DOESN'T MEASURE anything !!! It is a TRACKING app that the user enters measurements from a Blood Pressure test. My review is a factually accurate summation of your product.
I like I can keep a log of date and time and letting me know what is critical. When I see my doctor I can just show them my phone
Downloaded the app. Made the profile, and it took me straight to Facebook. Did not show me what my BP was once. Basically was A personal info gathering tool!

Bit early to rate properly yet as I have just started today but I am very satisfied with the ease of entering the information. A body temperature record would be great as well. I will rate again after a week or so.
Very handy for quick check on people with problems with blood pressure

title: Heart Rate Analyzer
description:
Introduction.
Heart Rate Analyzer is the App that allows you to perform a comprehensive data analysis of the Samsung heart rate sensor for both IR and RED sensors. Getting heart rate sensor data is possible only for Samsung devices, that are equipped such sensors OR some other Android devices that have the same sensors. But getting the results of analysis can be done on any Android device, if you transfer the sensor data from the Samsung devices by using external microSD-card or Google Drive cloud service.



Features.

Completely NO ads.

Oximeter.  Calculation the oxygen saturation (SpO2).

Possibility to save the raw heart rate sensor data of both IR and RED sensors to the internal memory, the external memory (e.g., micro SD-card), or to your Google Drive.

Possibility to load heart rate sensor data on another Android device using a micro SD-card or your Google Drive service.

Possibility to get heart rate sensor data with a duration between 30 sec and 30 min.

Possibility to create a database of your heart wave data for a long period of time for future analyzing.

Detailed visual inspection of heart wave data (finger arterial pressure FAP waveform).

Comprehensive data and statistical analysis of the many heart wave parameters, including long term data on one diagram. Besides the oxygen saturation, these parameters include heartbeats per minute (bpm), perfusion index, stiffness index, reflection index, peripheral augmentation index and more.

Color-defined values of the heart wave parameters and manual adjustment the alerting thresholds.


If you have any problems or any suggestions to improve this application, please feel free to contact


by e-mail: info.sergiosoft@gmail.com


Thanks!
